Articles.Content:
Hello!! 

I need some help, if you want to put in your thoughts into this, for making a contract for putting up a space station.

Here are the things that I need to figure out:

  1. What planet should the station orbit?
  2. What is the minimum requirements to make an official station
  3. How many funds do I have available 
  4. If I have mods, what should I install and how to include them to the station

Maybe if we clear all of this up, we can all do the challenge and compete of who can make the best station with the requirements.  

Thanks for everyone that will (hopefully) respond. I'll watch and respond to all of the responses.
